original_text: All the poles had bronze bases to hold them. But the workers used silver to make the hooks that were on the poles, and the sticks. They covered the tops of the poles with silver too. All the poles around the yard had silver sticks to join them together.
korean_text: 기둥 받침은 놋이요 기둥의 갈고리와 가름대는 은이요 기둥 머리 싸개는 은이며 뜰의 모든 기둥에 은 가름대를 꿰었으며

sentences.original_text: All the poles had bronze bases to hold them.
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 기둥은 그것들을 고정하기 위해 청동 받침을 가지고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: But the workers used silver to make the hooks
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 일꾼들은 갈고리를 만들기 위해 은을 사용했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They covered the tops of the poles with silver too.
All the poles around the yard had silver sticks
sentences.korean_translation: 뜰 주변의 모든 기둥은 은 막대기를 가지고 있었습니다.
